definition: net-like object/to hold sth in place with a net/to wind/to twist/(TCM) channels in the human body
"house on a cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 53), occurring in 店, 序, 底 etc
to say/to tell/to announce/to report/to denounce/to file a lawsuit/to sue

sentences.english: On some estimates, even online advertising could pick up by the end of the year.［419 words］
sentences.chinese: 根据一些预测，网络广告到年底也会有起色。

sentences.english: How to increase the market scale of online advertising in China?
sentences.chinese: 如何促进中国网络广告市场规模的成长？

sentences.english: 'Sufei's Diary' demonstrates how swiftly online advertising is changing here.
sentences.chinese: 《苏菲日记》展示出网络广告的变化有多迅速。

sentences.english: Cowan says she hopes one of those donors will answer her Internet ad.
sentences.chinese: 科文希望有捐献者能够回复她的网络广告。

sentences.english: The effective implementation of psychological effect of network advertisement is the key of its further development.
sentences.chinese: 网络广告心理效应的有效实现是其深度发展的关键。

sentences.english: Summit Forum Pries Unlimited Potentials of Network Ads.
sentences.chinese: 撬动网络广告的无限潜能。

sentences.english: The hope had been that exponential growth in online advertising would bring that sword out of the stone.
sentences.chinese: 人们曾经指望网络广告的指数级增长能拔出石中剑。

sentences.english: Kamangar's expertise is in online advertising.
sentences.chinese: 而卡曼加的专业知识是网络广告。

sentences.english: Network advertisement had had the taste of malign competition.
sentences.chinese: 网络广告已经有了恶性竞争的味道。

sentences.english: This, traditional media advertising and online advertising are so.
sentences.chinese: 这一点，传统媒体广告和网络广告都是如此。

sentences.english: Web advertising is in the midst of a metamorphosis.
sentences.chinese: 网络广告正处于嬗变过程当中。

sentences.english: Nowadays the network is developing so quick that the net-advertising emerges as the times require.
sentences.chinese: 在当今网络高速发展的时代，网络广告应运而生。

pinyin: dian3 ji1 fu4 fei4 guang3 gao4

definition: viral marketing/see also 病毒營銷|病毒营销[bing4 du2 ying2 xiao1]

pinyin: guo2 ji4 hu4 lian2 wang3 luo4
